Issue: All 340 products show 0 available variants - entire catalog is sold out
Suggested Fix: Restock inventory immediately. In Shopify: Products > Edit > Variants > set quantity > 0. Or set inventory policy to 'Continue selling when out of stock' if made-to-order.
